alert.note: Alert for Dade; Walker (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 25 at 4:31PM EDT until June 25 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR WALKER AND DADE COUNTIES... At 431 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lafayette, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lafayette, Trenton, Fort Oglethorpe, Rossville, Chickamauga, Lookout Mountain, La Fayette, Chattanooga Valley, Naomi, Center Post, Rising Fawn, Suttles Mill, Noble, Lakeview, Fairview, Linwood, Villanow, Chattanooga Valley, New England and Cloudland Canyon State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
